prompts: Create a small, brown Pokemon that burrows underground and has a cute face.
Show me a Pokemon that resembles a mole, with a round body and a sprout on its head.
Design a Pokemon that thrives in caves, featuring a simple, earthy color palette.
Imagine a ground-type Pokemon that can dig through rocks and has a playful personality.
Generate a Pokemon that looks like an adorable dirt mound with a pink nose and small eyes.
Make a creature that embodies the essence of the earth, with a distinctive underground living style.
Give me a Pokemon that is shy and spends most of its time hiding beneath the soil.
